overview: Thomas Dempsey MBA PgDip PM RICS MRICS FCIOB PTLLS: Mr Dempsey a Chartered Surveyor is the RICS elected member to its governing council. He is based in South Woodham Ferrers, an active member of Essex Professional and Business community. Mr Dempseyâ€™s field of professional academic interests is Customer satisfaction, transforming organisations and human behaviour. His research examines client perception of value created when procuring/creating major infrastructure, regeneration or property development. He has worked on major national and international infrastructure projects managing financial and contract matters. He says he gets great satisfaction working with stakeholders and multidiscipline teams.
